text: A year ago who would have thought we'd be relying on @GMB's @piersmorgan as one of the only journalists to hold corporate bandits and the Government to account 🔥👊🏻 The actions of @British_Airways' Willie Walsh are the epitome of corporate greed. #Coronavirus #BanditOfTheWeek https://t.co/zU1kBajgsT

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Good Morning Britain
entity.description: Good morning, Britain. Up early and need to catch up on the latest news, weather and sports? Then this weekday morning programme is for you, offering the latest information in such areas as entertainment, health and money. `Good Morning Britain' is the typical morning news and talk show. It features a number of presenters, correspondents and reporters covering what you should know to start your day before heading out the door.

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

domain.name: Brand Vertical
domain.description: Top level entities that describe a Brands industry

domain.name: Brand Category
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

domain.name: Entertainment Personality
domain.description: An entertainment personality in the world, like Anderson Cooper or Miranda Sings

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category
domain.description: A grouping of interests and hobbies entities, like Novelty Food or Destinations

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies
domain.description: Interests, opinions, and behaviors of individuals, groups, or cultures; like Speciality Cooking or Theme Parks

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
